vscode_dark: --text-color: #F5FBEF;--bg-color: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(43,43,43,1) 29%, rgba(29,29,29,1) 100%);--btn-bg-color: #188AFC;--btn-color: white;--next-btn-bg-color: #18bdd6;--table-color-1: white;--table-bg-color-1: #303030;--table-color-2: #fff;--table-bg-color-2: #222222;--start-btn-bg-color-1: #fff;--start-btn-bg-color-2: #1ba7ea;--settings-bg-color: #272727;--button-bg-color: linear-gradient(90deg, #188AFC, #00d2d4);--button-color: #fff;--input-color: #fff;--input-bg-color: #565656;--start-btn-color: black;--table-color-top: white;--table-bg-color-top: #1b1b1b;    --webkit-scrollbar-thumb-bg: #888;--code-block-bg: #F0F0F0;--code-block-box-shadow: #0000009c;--code-block-color: #000;--next-btn-box-shadow:rgb(0 0 0 / 15%);--btn-box-shadow:rgb(0 0 0 / 15%);--start-btn-box-shadow:rgb(0 0 0 / 15%);
